com.upc.repository

接口 UserNodeRepository

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<UserNode,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<UserNode,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<UserNode,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<UserNode,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface UserNodeRepository
extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<UserNode,java.lang.Long>

        @Query(value="match(n:UserNode) where n.user_id = {userId} return n")
UserNode findByUserId(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                             int userId)

      • createUserNode

        @Query(value="create(n:UserNode{ user_id:{userId},nick_name:{nickName} })")
void createUserNode(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                 int userId,
                                                                                                 @Param(value="nickName")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String nickName)

      • findByUserNodeId

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[b:Browser]->(m:Phone)where n.user_id = {userId} return m")
java.util.List<PhoneNode> findByUserNodeId(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                           int userId)

      • findBrowseTimes

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[b:Browser]->(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and  m.good_id = {goodId} return b.BrowseTimes")
int findBrowseTimes(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                           int userId,
                                                                                                                                                           @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                           int goodId)

      • findLastTime

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[b:Browser]->(m:Phone) where n.user_id = {userId} and  m.good_id = {goodId} return b.LastTime")
java.lang.String findLastTime(@Param(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                  int userId,
                                                                                                                                                                  @Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                                                  int goodId)

      • findByPhoneNodeId

        @Query(value="match p=(n:UserNode)-[b:Browser]->(m:Phone) where m.good_id = {goodId} return n")
java.util.List<UserNode> findByPhoneNodeId(@Param(value="goodId")
                                                                                                                                            int goodId)
